    <title>Banner Slider and Vertical Grid Clickable Buttons</title>
    <style>
        /* Styling for the banner slider */
        .slider-container {
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 800px; /* Adjust width as needed */
            margin: auto;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .slides {
            display: flex;
            transition: transform 0.5s ease;
        }

        .slide {
            min-width: 100%;
            height: 0;
            padding-bottom: 56.25%; /* 16:9 aspect ratio */
            background-size: cover;
            background-position: center;
        }

        /* Navigation buttons for the slider */
        .prev, .next {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            padding: 10px;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .prev {
            left: 10px;
        }

        .next {
            right: 10px;
        }

        /* Styling for clickable buttons with images in grid view */
        .button-container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(130px, 1000fr));
            gap: 10px;
            padding: 10px;
        }

        .link-button {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            text-decoration: none;
            color: black;
            border: 1px solid #999;
            border-radius: 10px;
            padding: 9px;
            background-color: white;
            transition: background-color 0.03s;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .link-button:hover {
            background-color: #ffdbbf;
        }

        .link-button img {
            border-radius: 5px;
            height: 50px; /* Adjust size as needed */
            width: 50px;  /* Adjust size as needed */
            margin-right: 10px; /* Space between image and text */
        }

        .link-button span {
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: bold;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Banner slider container -->
    <div class="slider-container">
        <div class="slides">
            <div class="slide" onclick="window.location.href='go:tsports'" style="background-image: url('https://image.tsports.com/images/mobile_logo/1719672720-LIVE.jpg');"></div>
            <div class="slide" onclick="window.location.href='go:jamuna'" style="background-image: url('https://i.ibb.co/bHdtcgD/image.png');"></div>
            <div class="slide" onclick="window.location.href='go:kids1'" style="background-image: url('https://i.ibb.co/n0GPXfz/image.png');"></div>
        </div>
        <button class="prev" onclick="moveSlide(-1)">‚ùÆ</button>
        <button class="next" onclick="moveSlide(1)">‚ùØ</button>
    </div>

    <!-- JavaScript for banner slider functionality -->
    <script>
        let currentSlide = 0;
        const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.slide');

        function showSlide(index) {
            if (index >= slides.length) {
                currentSlide = 0;
            } else if (index < 0) {
                currentSlide = slides.length - 1;
            } else {
                currentSlide = index;
            }
            const offset = -currentSlide * 100;
            document.querySelector('.slides').style.transform = `translateX(${offset}%)`;
        }

        function moveSlide(direction) {
            showSlide(currentSlide + direction);
        }

        // Automatic slider transition
        setInterval(() => {
            moveSlide(1);
        }, 5000); // Change slide every 5 seconds

        // Initial display
        showSlide(currentSlide);
    </script>
</body>
